channel.title: A Conversation in Darkness on Polar Larp
channel.description: Recent content in A Conversation in Darkness on Polar Larp

item.title: The Blessing of Murumbria
item.description: I give myself to the Darkness, I loyally will my spirit to Murumbria, I anchor my soul to eternal Abyss, I swear to be the Dark that banishes Light, Murumbria is true and Darkness does not faulter, In my darkest hour, they hear my cries and pleas for help, For Murumbria will always be my home, I willingly accept the Blessing of Darkness, to Murumbria I bind myself, Darkness will keep our minds free of the Lightâ€™s corruption
